Changes.Message: Fixed a bug where delta loads would fail if there are records evaluating to null during optimization. Bug introduced in 2.2.0
Fixed a bug which would not consider selections from unselected columns
GUI filters now respect wildcards (*)
Fixed a bug that caused trigger creation to fail on MaxDB databases. Requires update of /THEO/CDC_ECC
Fixed a bug that could cause optimization logic of delta extractions to not include all delta records in the result. Bug introduced in 2.2.0
Fixed a bug where tables could not be selected if they had multiple fields of type CLNT
Fixed a regression bug where ODP preview would fail for hierarchy DataSources.
Fixed transport request for /THEO/READ_TABLE for SAP versions 6.40 and newer.
Timestamp is now part of extraction result. Log tables are now created client dependent. Updated THEO/CDC/* to version 1.7. See release notes for details.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
## General
- In order for the changes to apply "Refresh metadata" is required or the creation of a new CDC extraction

## /THEO/CDC* (version 1.7)
- Triggers now insert timestamps (as chars) for every database in a unified format (yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mm:ss.FFF)
- Triggers now only insert data into the log table if the source table change was caused on the same client that was used when initializing CDC. This does not apply for client independent source tables

Changes.Message: BICS: Try to fix metadata retrieval for newer BW releases
Fixed a bug that caused filters to be removed when refreshing metadata
Removed column encryption.
Updated Z_XTRACT_IS_REMOTE_REPORT to version 1.3. Multiple changes to report component.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
- Updated Z_XTRACT_IS_REMOTE_REPORT to version 1.3. Added functionality for fetching values of variant selections and parameters.
- Selection and parameter values of selected variants are now displayed directly in selection screen, allowing users to identify required variants and change variant selection and parameter values more easily. __This feature requires an update of Z_XTRACT_IS_REMOTE_REPORT to version 1.3.__
- Selection and parameter values can now be supplied in output format, even if multiple values for a single selection are provided. This makes it much easier to work with the selection screen, since users don't have to know the internal representation of the fields in SAP to use them. __This feature requires an update of Z_XTRACT_IS_REMOTE_REPORT to version 1.3.__

Changes.Message: Fixed a bug where NameConverter would not shorten names correctly when the maximum length was an odd number.
Fix version number not written into assembly, causing problems in XtractIS due to the global assembly cache (GAC).
WPF library does now target net472 and net8.0-windows.
Extractor libraries are now targeting net472 and net8.0. GUI libraries target net472 and net8.0-windows.
BICS: Improve error message for metadata retrieval
Resolved a performance issue for execution of functions without callbacks with NW.
Updated NW RFC SDK to 750 PL13
Updated NW RFC SDK to 750 PL13

New version numbering scheme.
Setup now displays possible breaking changes when performing an update to a new version
Added support for new version history tools
List selection GUI: rename "equal to" to "element of"
MDX: Fix structures (broken since 2.0)
GUI now allows assignment of output runtime parameters to export parameters
Result sorting now takes place on SAP side. Removed support for Z_THEO_READ_TABLE. Check release notes for details
Changes.ReleaseNote:
- The extractor now makes use of the **ORDER BY** feature introduced in /THEO/READ_TABLE version **3.5**
- Increased extraction performance over extractor side sorting which could take a long time
- Existing extraction definitions using Z_THEO_READ_TABLE **do not need to be adjusted**. The extractor will automatically choose /THEO/READ_TABLE for extracting data
- Improved logging for result optimization

Changes.Message: Fixed a bug where clicking on "Load live preview" multiple times would lead to errors
Extended the CopyPasteTextBox to support error display.
Fixed a bug where refreshing the metadata without any objects selected for extraction would cause an unexpected error.
Allow empty names in NamedList
Fix non-structure table line types
Fix deletion of renamed parameters
MDX: Fix column order of legacy extractions with key figures on rows
MDX: Support legacy extractions with key figures on rows
Fixed a bug which would display only data sources using the language set in the connection (introduced in 1.47.0)
Released Monitoring Feature for Log Tables and Triggers. Update of /THEO/CDC* package required.
Fixed metadata and data retrieval for DF16_DEC and DF34_DEC
Improved table lookup window to not allow certain characters that would otherwise lead to errors on lookup.
Fixed metadata and data retrieval for DF16_DEC and DF34_DEC
Fixed a bug that caused refresh metadata to not work properly
Reflect user changes in parameter default values
Fix dimension on columns deserialization
Add backward-compatibility for dimension on columns feature
Use new parameter system
New selection & parameter system
Changes.ReleaseNote:
# Theobald.Extractors 2.0

* BW Cube filter / variables UI is the same as for other extraction types 
* BW Cube MDX generator produces more concise queries
* DeltaQ uses explicitly defined parameters instead of @-prefixes

Changes.Message: Delta extractions now only fetch data up to the maximum log table sequence number at the start of the extraction to avoid cursor concurrency conflicts with simultaneous inserts. Update of /THEO/CDC required.
Unicode control characters are now deleted before serializing log messages
MDX: Members named "all" are no longer removed from slicing

Fixed a visual bug where when scrolling the selection screen some parameters would have values from other parameters displayed. Fixed a bug where double clicking the 'Load Preview' button would cause an error.
Updated /THEO/READ_TABLE to version 3.5. It now supports ORDER BY.
Fixed a bug that caused faulty log table metadata when decimal places of a source table primary key type was not 0
BICS: Released as GA, no longer beta
BICS: Truncate NUMC values, if they are too long
BICS: Fix result metadata of key figures
BICS: Fix caching of results
BICS: Better error message for mandatory/state variables
BICS: preview will always return rows, if any exist
BICS: disabled filter context menu
Added refresh metadata functionality in the Table tool.
Support input runtime parameters of type Flag
RfcLibraryHelper now loads the VC++ dependencies before loading the RFC SDK dlls
Removed table parameter values from log output
Fixed a bug that caused the result optimization to not work properly if fields of type "RAW" were part of the source table primary key
Added the option on FilterTextBox to handle multiple entries separated by whitespace
Fixed a bug where in some cases changing extraction settings would reset changes made to WHERE and HAVING clauses.
Added direct read mode with support for aggregating fields
Fixed an issue that caused errors during extraction when the data contained invalid time or date values.
Updated /THEO/READ_TABLE to version 3.4.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
**Update /THEO/READ_TABLE to version 3.4**
- Fixed a bug where extracting decfloat16 and decfloat34 types did not work.
- Fixed a bug where extracting empty NUMC values would cause extraction to fail.

Changes.Message: There are now 2 different transports for S4 systems. One for S4 systems up to 7.55 and one for 7.55 and newer
Fixed a bug that caused initial load rollback to not completely remove log table metadata from the SAP system
Added input dialog
Results are now ordered by sequence number to prevent "Invalid result order" error during delta extractions.

Enabled column selection for hierarchy extractors, so that selectors can be used.
Added proper message to inform that DeltaQ does not support variable length strings.
Fixed a bug that prevented log table create statement from being generated on S4 systems with SAP_BASIS version 7.53 or below. Requires update of /THEO/CDC_S4.
Fix for using /THEO/READ_TABLE on big endian systems
Added option to select function module that is used during the extraction runs
Fixed a bug, introduced in 1.47.0, that would not create the LeafFrom and LeaftTo columns for hierarchy extractors
Fixed a bug where WebSocket RFC properties would not be cloned when calling R3Connection.Clone
Fixed a bug that caused the BAPI result row count to be 1 when it was actually 0
Add deletion transport request for Z_THEO_DELETE_LOG_ENTRIES function module.

Removed internal references of defunct products (XtractPPV, XtractQV, XtractRS) and destinations (AlteryxConnect, GoodData, MicroStrategy, ODataAtom, PowerBI, TableauConnector, Teradata, Vertica) from code base

Allow for dynamic buffers in encoding classes.
Add helper functions for ignoring exceptions.
RFC Service objects are now excluded from /THEO/CDC_ECC to avoid issues during import of the transport request.
Fixed a bug where subqueries in WHERE clause would cause an error.
Fix for trigger syntax error in IBM DB for z/os (DB6). Requires update of /THEO/CDC_ECC
Fixed a bug where trigger creation failed if ".INCLUDE" structures were part of the primary key of the source table. Requires update of /THEO/CDC_* package.
Removed debug logging statement that wrote the first 2 items of the extracted data into the log
Fixed a bug where log table creation failed due to missing namespace license. Requires update of /THEO/CDC_* package. Check release notes for details
Changes.ReleaseNote: - Log table names are now prefixed with 'ZTSCDC_' instead of '/THEO/CDC_'. The latter one could not be inserted into SAP table TADIR due to missing license for /THEO/ namespace.

Changes.Message: Log table key field number and maintenance level is now set explicitly. Fixed a bug where fallback logic would not work if system language is set to 'D'.
Fixed a bug in the activation process for DeltaQ hierarchy extractions
Changes.ReleaseNote:
**Theobald.Extractors 1.52.8**

This bug would prevent the update of segment names for intervals, nodes and descriptions during the extraction activation.

It was introduced in the version 1.47.0

Changes.Message: Fixed a bug where table settings UI would cause an error when saving. Updated /THEO/READ_TABLE to version 3.2 (see notes).
Changes.ReleaseNote:
# Updated /THEO/READ_TABLE to version 3.2
- Fixed a bug where extracting floating point data would cause an error.

Changes.Message: Fixed bugs in the DeltaQ extractor - Details in release notes
Changes.ReleaseNote:
**Theobald Extractors 1.52.6**

- fixed a bug which would finish the extraction erroneously as success, when a timeout failure was expected
- fixed check window fatal error, which would crash the designer on rfc server check failure
- fixed default timeout reading

Changes.Message: Fixed a bug that caused obscure error messages in case of special library errors
Improved error handling in log table creation step
Added support for SAP Max DB databases
Removed obsolete APIs as announced in 7.6.0
Fixed a bug that may cause missing fields in RFCFunction parameters if they contain table types with one unique key component.
Fixed a bug that caused Delta extractions to fail if source table was client-independent
Create table statement will now be logged in CDC initialization step.
Changed the default R3Connection Protocol to NWRFC as announced in 7.6.0. Added support for RFC over WebSocket.
Released /THEO/CDC package. **Breaking changes** - Please see release notes for details.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
### Breaking changes

- Extractions that were created with a previous version will only work if /THEO/CDC package is installed. Deleting CDC resources will however still work even without our package.

### Changes

- Added support for the following databases
 - IBM DB2
 - IBM for i (DB4)
 - IBM for z/os (DB6)
 - ORACLE

- The package resides in the /THEO/ namespace.
- Improved error messages.

Changes.Message: Added the result columns custom order implementation
Fixed a bug where Z_THEO_READ_TABLE could not be used as fallback to /THEO/READ_TABLE
Added /THEO/READ_TABLE as most preferred internal table extraction function module
Updated /THEO/READ_TABLE to version 3.1
Changes.ReleaseNote:
**Update /THEO/READ_TABLE to version 3.1**
- Fixed a bug where STRING and SSTRING columns would not be properly extracted when using NW library

Changes.Message: Fixed a bug where no description texts were retrieved. Extractor now uses a fallback logic where the longest available and non-empty text is retrieved.
Added TraceLevel property to R3Connection
Fixed an issue where data would not be properly extracted when using STREAM_READ_TABLE function modules in combination with some SAP code pages.
Added a separate /THEO/READ_TABLE transport request for SAP versions 6.40 to 7.03.
Improved handling of list runtime parameters in MDX filter selections
Fixed a bug that caused invalid results when function modules contained DECFLOAT16/34 parameters or fields
Do not fallback to default, if SNC environment variable is not set
Migrated XtractKernel.Scripting
Slightly refactored the DeltaQ extractor
Added support for SAP systems below version 7.40SP05. Requires /THEO/READ_TABLE to be installed.
Released /THEO/READ_TABLE function module.
Fixed a parallelization issue caused by limitations in the callback handling when using NWRFC.
The maximum allowed value for the log table size limit has been raised to 500.000 entries.
Fixed DeltaQ check window's help link
Removed Hadoop from license library
Fix tables in tables
Fixed a bug that caused the preview button to be disabled after initial lookup regardless of whether previewing was supported by the provider

Removed optional business rule ServerNameShouldBeSet for XtractForAlteryx Designer ("Desktop") licenses. Since we can't enforce this limit it doesnt make sense to save it into the licenses. With this business rule gone, the automated license tool can now create new XfA Designer licenses without a server name (field is entirely optional now).
Added a hotkey window
Enable f1 help hotkey for extraction windows. These link to the online help entry.
Enable f1 hotkey to link window specific online help entry.
Fixed a bug where changing function module in settings would in some cases cause an error.
Fixed a bug that caused errors on the Alteryx Server when DCM connections were used (Bug introduced in 1.20.3)
Fixed an issue that caused NotSupportExceptions for Hierarchy extractions
Improved error handling for Alteryx DCM integration
Added JsonReader.ReadObjectDynamicObject() and JsonReader.ReadDynamicArray()
Added support for list parameters
Fixed a bug where no new connections could be created with Alteryx Designer versions below 2022.3
Added option to configure package size for initial load.
Ported the DeltaQ component from XtractKernel with new UI
The maximum allowed value for the log table size limit has been raised to 200.000 entries.
Fixed a bug that caused log table creation to fail when ".INCLUDE" structures were part of primary keys in source table.
Marked LicenseLoader as obsolete; introduced new LicenseValidator class instead which can perform license validation checks; added method CheckProductAndKind to ProductLicense; added unit tests
Updated & improved texts for various licensing error messages; fixed possible bugs
Added NumericTextBox
Fixed a bug where a error was displayed after choosing to cancel the setup because of a running process (e.g. Alteryx Server or Designer currently running/busy).
Fixed byte buffer manager empty string writing
Fixed column encryption buffer writing validation
Added clear option for grouped filter boxes.
Improved behaviour around DateTo property of Hierarchy extractor. Empty values are now considered invalid instead of falling back to SAP max date.
DateTime to/from string conversion helpers. Function for opening a file with timeout.
Function for BapiExtractor which communicates when data was received from the SAP system.
Usage of all available contexts is now allowed. This enables SLT support.
Added support for runtime parameters
TS_SEQUENCE_NUMBER is now a 64 bit integer and supports extractions with more than 2 billion rows. Additionally, it can also be selected for generation in full extractions.
Added support for where conditions
Fixed a bug that caused unexpected measure precision in MDX query extractions.
New and edited SAP connections are now saved within the Alteryx DCM when possible
Improved error handling in refresh metadata; added validation to DateTo property; made DateTo property setter public so that it is available for runtime parameters
Enabled 'dateTo' property of Hierarchy catalog entry to be set by runtime parameter. Improved value validation and error handling.
BICS: Fixed direct extraction of SNUMC InfoObjects
Replaced AbapSignedNumericCharacter.ToLong() with AbapSignedNumericCharacter.ToDecimal()
BICS: Fixes for SNUMC characteristics
Fixed a bug where description texts were not extracted when the InfoObject name was shorter than expected.
BICS: Improved safeguards against truncated decimal key figure values
BICS: Added safeguards against truncated decimal key figure values
BICS: Added support for time, date and null key figure values
Added groupable filterboxes to filter a datagrid by multiple columns
Runtime parameters of type list can now be used for (NOT) IN operators in the where builder
Added support for list parameters
Assert uniqueness of output column names
Fixed a bug that causes errors in subsequent tools when copying Xtract tools and using the old Alteryx engine
BICS: Fixed integer, decimal and partial float key figure values
MDX: Fixed legacy name conflict resolution
Fixed a bug that caused errors when passing pipeline tables into the BAPI tool (Bug introduced in 1.19.0)
Runtime parameters can now be provided from the workflow pipeline using input connection 'P'

Added some ergonomics for arrays and DateTime formats.
Added JSON serialization for various classes.
BICS: Fixed data type of integer characteristics
Added AbapSignedNumericCharacter
BICS: Fixed data type of timestamp characteristics
Moved some licensing code to a separate project. Marked outdated licensing enum members as obsolete.
Add win32 job API
New FolderBrowserDialog: Increased search depth, changed icons to windows stock icons, hide system entries and hidden folders, added manual path input field and improved perfomance.
MDX: fixed a bug that caused errors when deselecting all measures
Multiple UI fixes and usability improvements.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
## Multiple UI fixes and usability improvements
- Fixed a bug where an error would be thrown when trying to edit joins on same tables
- Window for JOIN definitions now doesn't allow to define joins without specifying tables
- It is no longer possible to add joins in extraction that has no tables defined

Changes.Message: BICS: Added safeguards against truncated CHAR / NUMC characteristic values
BICS: Filter is applied for characteristics that are not selected for output
BICS: Fix for result copying
BICS: new implementation
Added option to run initial load as background job
Workaround for SAP returning dates in inconsistent formats
Fix for "Dimension on columns" setting not working correctly for MDX Query extractions with "Only Structures" set to false.
Fixed a bug that could cause multiple records with the same key to be included in a CDC extraction result
Implemented CopyPasteTextBox.
Fixed a bug that caused the Alteryx Designer to close in case of an error
Fixed a bug that caused an IndexOutOfRangeException when incoming tables were disconnected previously
Fixed a bug that caused the tool to not run when an input connection existed and the AMP Engine was used
BICS: Fixes for filter preview
BICS: Improve session initialization
MDX: Fixed result columns of converted extractions (was broken since 1.34)
MDX: Fixed Hierarchy member filter
Added query extractor
Added new query extractor
Added Update-Reminder feature
Improved report API for yunIO
Fix metadata of decimal float as packed number

Added option to abort setup in case of running processes (Alteryx Designer and Server).
Fixed bug where the wrong version number was displayed in the about window of the BAPI tool.
Separate Column Detection step for yunIO Report
BICS: Removed redundant characteristics id serialization
Dimensions are sorted alphabetically descending by description text in GUI
Added surrogate key result table
R3Connection.GetSSOTicket() now supports SNC SSO with NWRFC
Fix in BICS mode for possible NullReferenceException during preview and extraction run
In BICS mode it is now possible to deselect dimensions that are defined on rows in a query extraction.
Various breaking changes to R3Connection API
Changes.ReleaseNote:
# Changes to R3Connection
The following properties/methods have been removed.

* `MultithreadingEnvironment` The feature is always active and cannot be disabled.
* `AllowStartProgram(string programList)`. Please contact support if you really need this feature.


The following properties/constructors/methods have been marked as obsolete and will be removed 2023-10-01.

* `ConnectionString` --> Please use `ParseConnectionString()` instead.
* `R3Connection(string connectionString)` --> Please use `ParseConnectionString()` instead.
* `Open(string rfcConnectionString)`--> Please use `ParseConnectionString()` instead.
* `OpenSSO(string ticket, bool loadBalancing)` --> Please set `LogonTicket` and `UsesLoadBalancing` instead.
* `OpenSSO(string ticket)` --> Please set `LogonTicket` instead.
* `Open(bool useLoadBalancing)` --> Please set `UsesLoadBalancing` instead.
* `GetSSOTicket(bool loadBalancing)` -->  Please set `UsesLoadBalancing` instead.
* `SetAbapDebug(bool enabled)` --> Please use external breakpoints in ABAP debugger instead.


`ClientProtocol.RFC` has been marked as obsolete. Please use `ClientProtocol.NWRFC` instead. The default value will be switched to NWRFC 2023-10-01.

Changes.Message: Report improvement for coming feature in yunIO
Internal changes due to changed licensing model for TableCdc component.
Fixed a bug where filtering for columns based on name or description was not possible
BICS mode: Fixed dimension filter members not loading and filters with runtime parameter values not being applied.
BICS: Row limit for preview
Reduced max value for log table size limit to 100.000 rows.
Fixed a bug that caused errors with obsolete LIKE typed parameters
The setup can now be run without admin privileges to install for user-only Alteryx instances
Classic RFC: Fixed a bug that caused import parameters in server and callback functions to be filled with garbage values when the application server did not supply them in the call
VC++ 2013 setup was replaced by directly used DLLs (msvcp120.dll and msvcr120.dll)
The size limit feature for the log table is now obligatory. Value can range from 1 to 10.000.000 rows.

Classic RFC: Fixed a bug that caused an AccessViolationException when adding rows to a table that is defined in the server function, but not actually part of the call initiated by the SAP application server
Improved metadata load and refresh in the BICS component.
Replaced the local byte serialization/deserialization on Ewkb with the ByteSerialization from Theobald.Common (introduced on 2.22.0)
Added ByteSerialization and ByteBufferManager classes
Changes.ReleaseNote:
- Theobald.Common 2.22.0

ByteSerialization has implementations, in little and big endian, for serializing and deserializing different dotnet types in/from raw bytes.

ByteBufferManager references the ByteSerialization (according to the given endianness) and implements methods to handle writing, reading and slicing a byte buffer.

Changes.Message: Replaced the local byte buffer handling for column encryption with the ByteBufferManager from Theobald.Common (introduced on 2.22.0)
Table CDC: Log table size can now be limited. Internal improvements.
Fix for column order changes in MDX mode when adding filter selections or selecting and deselecting a dimension.
Added Direct load button in cube look up window.

Increased the number of iterations for PBKDF2.
Implemented constant time byte array comparison.
Added test cases for constant time array comparison.
New EULA
Measure names in BICS mode now display the technical name instead of the enterprise ID if available.
Fixed an issue that may cause errors when setting exclude filters or runtime parameters in filters when using MDX mode.
Added refresh metadata button and fixed an issue where some property texts may not be displayed in MDX extractions created with Xtract for Alteryx versions older than 1.15.0.
BapiCatalogEntry with functionGroup
Added SNCSettings.RunImpersonated
Added Global.SetCpicConnectTimeout()
Logging cleanup & refactoring
Added doc strings to interface IR3Connection. Cleanup, corrections, and some see and seealso references added to comments on both IR3Connection and R3Connection
Improved error message for when report lookup by TCODE fails.
Fixed a bug in MDX metadata refresh that caused invalid selections when a selected measure or dimension does not exist after refresh anymore.
Report component UI improvements.
Method for JSON serialization of empty array
Updated librfc32 64-bit to 753 PL700
Updated NW RFC SDK to 750 PL11
Various improvements and new features in BICS cube extractor
Changes.ReleaseNote:
# New BICS feature: Member display 
Allows to define how members are displayed in result set: "Text", "Key" or "Text and Key". Selecting "Text and Key" will add an additional column for each selected dimension and property containing the key.

# Improved metadata retrieval
Improved the metadata retrieval especially when using BEx Queries with mandatory variables. 

# Internal improvements
Internal improvements to increase extraction performance and stability. The "BICS Fast Mode" is not available anymore because of an improved, more efficient extraction logic.

Changes.Message: Report helper and Report tests
Only send scalar parameters if value has been provided
Detect ineffective attempts to change SNC library after it has already been loaded
BWCube: fix for invalid MDX when selecting a hierarchy and a property on the same dimension
Added support for External ID
Adjustments for new conversion architecture (internal changes)
Updated Bouncy Castle to version 2.0
Support for writing ULEB128 encoding of 64-bit unsigned integer to byte array
Added Table CDC extractor
Removed LINQtoERP VS2012
Added Table CDC as new LicenseComponent
Updated Z_XTRACT_IS_REMOTE_REPORT to version 1.2. (Breaking change)
Changes.ReleaseNote:
*Changes in Z_XTRACT_IS_REMOTE_REPORT*:
- Added Z_TS_PROG authorization object
- Authority check on Z_TS_PROG is now performed at the beginning of extraction. Should the authority check fail and the report is assigned to an authorization group, another authority check on S_PROGRAM is performed. If both authority checks fail, the extraction is aborted with an error.
- *IMPORTANT:* Reports not assigned to an authorization group can't be extracted anymore without having an appropriate Z_TS_PROG authorization object assigned to user.

Changes.Message: Fix for possible error when saving dimension filters in MDX mode
Added range checks for SapDateConverter
Fix for error on InfoCube load in MDX mode
Made ReadJsonProperty() and WriteJsonFields() public
Improved Hierarchy Extractor. Now full support for Links, Intervals, and all variants of time dependent Hierarchy structure. Performance tested for Hierarchies with up to 1 million rows.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
* Reworked extraction algorithm for Hierarchies. Removed limitations and improved performance for hierarchies up to 1 million entries. Now full support for Intervals and all variations of Time Dependent Hierarchy structure.
* Order of Hierarchy rows now identical to order shown in SAP
* Ids of Hierarchy rows now identical to Ids shown in SAP
* New Representation: ParentChildWithNodeNames (beta)
* New extractions get two new columns: Link and Row. Link indicates the Id of the original Node if the current row represents a link node. Row represents a row number. This can be used as primary key in database destinations while preserving the order of rows. Existing extractions are not changed and will not show these columns
* Support for newer SAP systems (HANA) and extra long strings.

Changes.Message: New Hierarchy Extractor
Changes.ReleaseNote:
* Completely rewritten algorithm + unit and integration tests
* Now supports Links, Intervals, and all variations of Time Dependent Hierarchies
* Order and Ids of retrieved elements now identical to values displayed in SAP GUI / rsh1
* Old json configuration files still working
* New configuration options: debug logging, show link & row column
* New columns Link and Row only extracted for new extractions (for backwards compatibility)
* New Representation: ParentChildWithNodeNames

Changes.Message: Added classes to convert geometry EWKB to WKB and WKT
Fix for incorrect unit column values in MDX mode.
Added the option to select a custom structure on the columns axis for MDX extractions.

Introduced a new type for ergonomic handling of the logger.
Extended JSON writer to write ulong types.
Introduced a new interface for the LicenseLoader.
Fix for XtractDataGridRowHeader style
Fix for Table preview's grid row header style
Added a 64bits version for the Fnv1a hash generator
Switched default RFC library to NWRFC
Fix for possible conversion errors when formatted values option in MDX mode is enabled
Cube legacy mode: fix for duplicate dimension column names
Moved SlimXml + Language Key to ERPConnect
AbapDate.ToString() now returns ABAP string representations of dates.
Added AbapDate, removed ConversionUtils, renamed UtcLong to AbapTimestamp
Fixes for timestamps
Fixes for TIMESTAMPL (bug introduced in 1.33.0)
Added metadata retrieval for more date/time types
Added UtcLong.Parse()
Moved Abap* classes to ERPConnect
Added more date/time ABAP types
Added more date/time result types
Values of RfcReadTableResult instances can now be accessed by column name.
Added column mapping feature
Updated Z_THEO_READ_TABLE to version 2.15.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
*Changes in Z_THEO_READ_TABLE*:
- Code style change

Changes.Message: Fixed a bug that caused measures in MDX mode being handled as strings instead of numbers when the formatted values option is enabled.
Introduced ILog interface to reduce coupling with specific log implementations.
The extractors now use the new ILog interface. The BAPIExtractor now can take a callback being called when the data has arrived from the SAP system.

Updated licensing logic to no longer care about Sources limits where possible. Marked various helper methods as Obosolete. Existing licenses with Sources limit are still supported.
Removed display of Sources limit from About dialog.
Changes.ReleaseNote: Applications should update their license validation logic to ignore a Sources limit if the license contains one.

Changes.Message: Updated Z_THEO_READ_TABLE to version 2.14
Changes.ReleaseNote:
*Changes in Z_THEO_READ_TABLE:*
-  Changed how the run time is calculated. This prevents overflow when high timeout values are used.

Changes.Message: Non executable ABAP programs can't be selected in report lookup anymore.
Changes.ReleaseNote: - Non executable ABAP programs can't be selected in report lookup anymore and an error is shown instead. This way users will be informed about report not being extractable already during the lookup, instead of at runtime.

Changes.Message: Packed numbers that exceed the precision of System.Decimal throw an exception instead of being rounded
Updated gacutil
Packed numbers that exceed the range of System.Decimal throw an exception instead of being cut off silently
Fixed a bug that caused errors during metadata retrieval if the function module contains include structures that don't exist
added support for function modules /BODS/RFC_STREAM_READ_TABLE and /SAPDS/RFC_STREAM_READ_TABLE
added support for function modules /BODS/RFC_STREAM_READ_TABLE and /SAPDS/RFC_STREAM_READ_TABLE
Updated Z_THEO_READ_TABLE to version 2.13.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
*Changes in Z_THEO_READ_TABLE*:
- Shared memory area now expires after 1 minute without read access, instead of 1 minute without write access. This prevents extractions that take longer that 1 minute to fetch or process one package from failing.

Changes.Message: Fixed assembly version of Theobald.Extractors.Ohs.dll
Introduced Execute(RFCFunction) method to IR3Connection interface to improve testability of R3Connection dependent code
Fixed an issue where trailing zeros of RAW fields where truncated
Fixed a bug where TCODE lookup would not work with some newer SAP systems.
Fixed a bug in WHERE clause editor, where single quotes in value blocks would not be escaped when running the extraction, causing syntax errors.
Fixed a bug in WHERE clause editor where using numeric values in value blocks would in some cases not result a correct WHERE clause.
Fix for structure includes
Fix for failing mdx extractions with packaging enabled and only dimensions selected.
Updated Z_THEO_READ_TABLE to version 2.12
Changes.ReleaseNote:
*Changes in Z_THEO_READ_TABLE*:
- Fixed a bug where when data was fetched and sent to extractor too fast, it could cause some data packages to be sent multiple times
- Background job log now displays package numbers

Changes.Message: Support for writing Date/Time JSON array elements
Updated NWRFC SDK to 7.50 Patch-Level 10
Refactored all MDX RFC Functions to static creation; added support for non-unicode SAP systems.
Cube BICS mode now supports list parameters in filters and variables.
Non-blocking (async) versions of the IO helper functions were added
Fix for asynchronous processing problems
Added extractions limit on about window
JSON serialization for date/time
Added IResultTables for value conversion
Fixed Bug around License Business Rules for YunIO licenses.
Removed ERPConnect45.dll - please use ERPConnectStandard20.dll or ERPConnect35.dll instead
Added new field Extractions to ProductLicense and updated Tests and LicenseBuilders accordingly. Moved shared code from License creation applications to Common.
Internal adjustments to BEx variable dialog button behavior in BICS mode.
Added unit and integration tests for Table Extractor
Removed support for legacy DLL licenses
Fixed a bug that caused extractions to fail with "Expected new buffer marker" error
Added new field Extractions to ProductLicense. Fixed property Sources not to be nullable anymore. Moved common code from Licensing Tools to Theobald.Licensing
MDX mode: invalid measure values 'X' are now written to the output as NULL.
Fix for disabled measures/dimensions tree in MDX mode when a query does not have any measures.
The progress dialog now always runs the work load on a background thread.
Support for Only_Structures behavior in MDX BEx Queries. Various bug fixes and general improvements for the Cube component.
Support for Only_Structures behavior in MDX BEx Queries. Various bug fixes and general improvements for the Cube component.
Changes.ReleaseNote: Added option "Only Structures" in Lookup window for MDX Queries. Enables the same behavior as the "Legacy Metadata Retrieval" option before XU 5.6. This must be set during lookup and can not be changed later. Customers that have Cube extractions which used the "Legacy Metadata retrieval" option before should run the Config Converter again.

Changes.Message: Fixed a bug where scalar parameters disappeared from the tool properties
Extractors that implement the complex parameter interface must also implement scalar parameter interface
Fixed a bug where the CsvLineReader would return lines multiple times if the buffer is small enough.
Fixed a bug where saving an Idoc schema incorrectly changed field names
Changes.ReleaseNote:
# ERPConnect 6.14.19

Idoc segment field names had `ST_` and `FZ_` at their beginning replaced with `USTU-` and `UFZU-`. This is due to a bug in the internal name escaping logic. This fix might break existing code that already circumvents this bug.

Changes.Message: Added integration tests for real-world ProductLicenses
Fix for date columns being 0 and in wrong format in date columns of BICS extractions.
Fixed a bug where tables with built-in types were not created correctly using R3Connection.CreateFunction
Fix for unavailable runtime parameters in dimension range filters.
Added overload to ProductLicense.Sign which allows to specify a CreationDate.
Report component is now out of beta.
Fix for STRING/XSTRING columns with NWRFC
Fixed a bug that caused using the wrong function module for loading axis data in MDX extractions.
Cube legacy mode: fix for duplicate property column names
Fixed a bug that caused extractions with empty result sets to fail.
Fixed a bug where the advanced settings button was disabled for providers that do not support deltas
Fixed a bug where switching from WHERE clause editor mode to text mode would cause an error.
Added graphical where clause editor.
Added graphical WHERE clause editor. Fixed a bug where Count Rows function didn't take scripted expressions into account.
Fixed a bug where BW Cube Extractions would return broken data when used with Classic RFC library
Selections can now be parameterized with lists of strings
Now allowing extractions without measure selections in MDX mode. Added support for additional options in interval/complex BEx variable selections.
Now allowing extractions without measure selections in MDX mode. Added support for additional options in interval/complex BEx variable selections.
Updates to the BWCube component for increased stability, performance and compatibility.
Updated BWCube component with multiple improvements regarding stability, performance and compatibility.
About window was refactored
About window was refactored
Added a LoggerTrace which logs to the Debug Console. That allows to debug GUI applications because they don't have a console to write to.
Introduced Interface IR3Connection to make consumers of R3Connection testable.
Added upload check script in order to confirm if the setup file has the expected version
Refactoring for the certificate pinning and TLS error handling interfaces
Fix for about window to display server or cluster info correcly according to the license
General Availability (end of beta)
Added SnapsToDevicePixels=true to Style
Fixed a bug where the report lookup would throw an error when the new version of RFC_READ_TABLE was used.
Updated Z_THEO_READ_TABLE to version 2.11. Background job timeout can now be set manually in extraction settings.
Fixed a bug where metadata of views was not retrieved correctly.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
- Fixed a bug where the metadata of dynamic fields of views would not get fetched on table lookup.
- Fixed a bug where columns of views were not in correct order. The columns are now in the same order they are defined in in SAP.

Changes.Message: Fix for ProgressDialog error handling
Added ControlNotInitializedException, marked TaskRunner as obsolete
Metadata can now be refreshed without performing a new lookup
Added text box icon.
Improvements for certificate enrollment
Improvements from Code Review for License Creation logic.
Fix for tracing null values
Introducing style for readonly textboxes
Added Theobald.CertificateEnrollment
Fix for BCD length conversion
Added description texts for data elements
Derived classes of ERPException are Serializable now
Support to have an instance of ProcessAsync
Fix for "undefined" status of process chain
Table & ODP: Now set currency decimals to 4 when using "adjust currency decimals"

Added method to ILicenseBusinessRule that indicates whether the Rule applies to a certain Property of  a ProductLicense. This is helpful in a UI to highlight the input fields where a user has made bad inputs.
Fix for data types when using workflow tables as input

Added static methods to ProductLicense which indicate whether a License CanHaveComponents and CanHaveDestinations based on LicenseProduct and LicenseKind. This is helpful for the new LicenseTools. Also added a class LicenseFileWriter which encapsulates some directory and filename logic which is shared beteen LicenseTool and AutomatedLicenseCreation.
Reworked parameterization
Fixed a bug where report rows without pipes in them were being skipped even if the extraction was ran without dynamic column widths and offsets setting turned on. This change is breaking.
16-Bit character code points are now correctly displayed in JSON strings
Table and ODP: Added setting to automatically adjust currency decimals based on reference field
Changes.ReleaseNote:
- design and runtime SAP users need access to table TCURX
- existing extractions require metadata refresh (Table) or new lookup (ODP)
- metadata will be adjusted to fixed decimal with 14 decimal places

Changes.Message: Added folder browser.

Added LicenseSerialNumber and tests to Theobald.Licensing. Contains all business rules to create a LicenseSerialNumber as it is used in CRM. For automation of the License File creation, this code should be centrally available.

Fixed a bug where fetching report selection parameters would not use the custom function module defined in extraction settings and would override that setting with the default value of Z_XTRACT_IS_REMOTE_REPORT.
Added PersistedCounter to library to centralize all relevant code around License Creation into Theobald.Licensing.
Delimiter for rows can now be set in CsvReader
Add constructor to initialize NamedList from IEnumerable
Added WaitRegistration class
ProcessAsync flags set to create no console window
ProcessAsync added support for arguments
Updated cube component adding BICS extraction mode.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
# Xtract for Alteryx 1.13.0

The cube component got a major update containing new features and internal improvements.

## MDX mode

- **Improved performance** through some internal optimizations
- **Runtime Parameter** are supported in variables and dimension filters

## BICS mode (Beta)

We have added a new cube extraction mode using the BICS interface. This interface is currently in a public beta stadium and should only be used for preview and testing purposes. There can be major breaking changes until the stable release.

Changes.Message: Updated cube component with new BICS mode (beta).
Changes.ReleaseNote:
The cube component got a major update containing new features and internal improvements.

## MDX mode

- **Improved performance** through some internal optimizations
- **Runtime Parameter** are supported in variables and dimension filters

## BICS mode (Beta)

We have added a new cube extraction mode using the BICS interface. This interface is currently in a public beta stadium and should only be used for preview and testing purposes. There can be major breaking changes until the stable release.

Fixed an issue where an RFCServer would not update its code page when using NWRFC

Fixed function module recognition based on signature.
Changes.ReleaseNote:
## Fixed function module recognition based on signature.

In cases where the name of the used function module is unknown, the extractor tries to identify and verify the function module based on its signature. This check has now been fixed.

Changes.Message: Output columns now have length of 255 characters when dynamic column widths and offsets is turned on.

Added TemplateSegments property to access IDoc schema information
Backward-compatibility for default destinations (new licenses on old XU versions)
Client handles of StdIn, StdOut and StdErr in the Process-Wrapper are now closed correctly on the server side after sending them to the client.

Reverted default package size, this fixes an issue where the package size doubles leading to an error

- Fixed a bug where cancelling the edits of the a report extraction would still overwrite selection values and column changes with new values.
- Fixed a bug where using runtime parameters would make it impossible to run automatic column detection or preview.

Changes.ReleaseNote:
##Theobald.Common 2.14.6
- Introduced new WPF window based messaging system, which allows the displaying of message windows always on screen's top most position, overlapping all current opened windows. 
- The messages are displayed always on the center of the screen
- No owner parameter is needed, as it considers always the current active window for it.
- All calls can be done through TheoMessageHelper.
- MessageBoxHelper is still available, but was marked as obsolete.

Changes.Message: The tool now supports EXPORT parameters that will be merged and output into the E pipeline. Table EXPORT parameters will be mapped to connections 1-5.
Added custom Number struct and ReadNumber method to JsonReader
Several improvements and new features
Changes.ReleaseNote:
# Improvements for BAPI extractor

The internal representation has changed, **old extractions will no longer work and need to be recreated.** The new BAPI component packs several new features:

- EXPORTS
- CHANGINGS
- nested structures and tables
- transaction commit by calling `BAPI_TRANSACTION_COMMIT`
- values for tables can now be entered or parameterized per row
- Now specifies whether a parameter is supplied or requested from the SAP system. This allows for optimizations when using NWRFC and for the function modules default values to be used.

Changes.Message: Fixed a bug where fetching the field metadata for views would not work if multiple fields of the view referenced the same table fields.
Fixed a bug where field descriptions of views would not be fetched on newer SAP BW systems.
Fixed an issue where extractions would fail for big-endian SAP systems when NetWeaver libraries were used
Added new License Destination for Sql Server Reporting Services
Column level encryption support
7Bit encoding stream extensions for i32 and BigInteger

Fixed a bug where the CSVReader would not correctly signal a new line,
Fixed a bug where the CSVReader would ignore a line break after a quoted cell
Improvements for NWRFC multithreading
Fix for writing TimeSpan on JsonWriter class

##2.14.1 - Fix for writing TimeSpan on JsonWriter class

* Fixed bug for writing TimeSpan on JsonWriter class, which caused an addition of an extra hour to its total time when the minutes property had its value greater or equal to 30
* Centralization of TimeSpan serialization to string in StringHelper.ToIso8601Duration(TimeSpan)
* Addition of unit tests for JsonWriter.Write(string, Timespan) and StringHelper.ToIso8601Duration(TimeSpan)

Changes.ReleaseNote:
# Theobald.Extractors 1.15.1

The subscription suffix can be set during runtime and is used to differentiate two subscriptions (inits) on a single SAP system (e.g. dev and test on a single QA SAP system).

Changes.ReleaseNote: This change was made to fix a bug where deserializing an RFCFunction via LoadFromXML would deserialize all the export parameters as `IsSupplied = true` causing an empty string to be sent to SAP. This in turn would cause SAP to not use the default values for those parameters.

Changes.ReleaseNote:
### GUI Preview
- Correctly displays records again
- Column names now match the selected column name style

### Table
- The Alias for table fields was removed as it was not working correctly. To prevent naming conflicts when joining tables please use the *PrefixedCode* column name style.
- Aggregated fields now have a generated column name with the aggregate function name preceeding the column name (e.g. *Minimum_MARA~BRGEW*). **This could break existing workflows that use aggregate functions.**

### Table
- The Alias for table fields was removed as it was not working correctly. To prevent naming conflicts when joining tables please use the *PrefixedCode* column name style.
- Aggregated fields now have a generated column name with the aggregate function name preceeding the column name (e.g. *Minimum_MARA~BRGEW*). **This could break existing workflows that use aggregate functions.**

# Xtract for Alteryx 1.7.2

## BW Cube 
Cube property naming was changed to keep them unique. From now on they are named like [DimensionName].[PropertyName]. This change might impact your workflow, depending on your design. If you are experiencing any issues with the new naming, please contact our support team.

Changes.ReleaseNote:
### Indexed table fields
- This function displays an icon indicating whether the field is indexed and the sort direction (ascending/descending).


### Counting / Estimating number of rows
- When using **Z_THEO_READ_TABLE** the result rows will be counted using a real query. This means, the resulting row count respects current *joins* and the *where clause*.
- Other function modules will use the function module **EM_GET_NUMBER_OF_ENTRIES** to get the maximum number of available rows.

### Required persmissions
Those two new features require following permissions on the SAP system
- **Indexed fields**: Read from table **DD17S**
- **Estimate row count (other than *Z_THEO_READ_TABLE*)**: Execute function module **EM_GET_NUMBER_OF_ENTRIES**

Improvements for detecting possible joins and bug fixes related to editing joins
Changes.ReleaseNote:
The changes contained in this release only affect the GUI and do not change behavior of extractions.

### Join detection
Upon adding a new table to the extraction the GUI will attempt to automatically create joins based on the references in the SAP system. Detection will take the following steps to map fields with matching names:

1. Primary keys that directly reference another table
2. Primary keys that both reference the same table which does not exist in the extraction
3. All fields that directly reference another table
4. All fields that both reference the same table which does not exist in the extraction

### Bug fixes
- fixed a bug where editing of joins was not possible after saving an extraction

Changes.ReleaseNote:
# Xtract for Alteryx 1.0

If you have installed version 0.x (beta), you need to manually uninstall it first. SAP connections from v0.x can be reused. Workflows from v0.x are not compatible.

Changes.Message: Fixed a bug where an exception that occurred while calling a client function could be replaced by a NullReferenceException
Fix for receiving nested tables
NWRFC: Fixed alignment issue related to includes
General Availibility (end of beta)
Fixed license check.
Fix for sequential execution of functions with same callback names but different metadata
Fix for R3Connection IDisposable implementation

Fixed an error in cube filter serialization.
Fixed an issue that may have caused errors when using snc authentication.
Fixed a bug in Z_THEO_READ_TABLE where ABAP version check was not working on systems running ABAP version 75C. Fixed client handling in Z_THEO_READ_TABLE.

Some collections are implementing generic IList<T> now instead of non-generic interfaces
Changes.ReleaseNote:
# ERPConnect 6.3

The base class / collection interface of following classes have changed:
- RFCParameterCollection
- RFCServerFunctionCollection
- RFCStructureCollection
- RFCTableCollection
- RFCTableColumnCollection

These classes don't inherit from CollectionBase any more and no longer implement non-generic collection interfaces like IList. They now implement the generic IList<T> interface.
This is a breaking change, but it shouldn't require any code adjustments in most cases.

Changes.Message: Another fix for R3Connection.CreateFunction() on some non-Unicode systems (TABLE_NOT_ACTIVE, bug introduced in 6.2.1).
